mapper.insert: insert into goods(goodsName, goodsPrice, disPrice, intotal, categoryId, imgurl) values (#{goodsName},#{goodsPrice},#{disPrice},#{intotal},#{categoryId},#{imgurl})
mapper.update: update goods set goodsName = #{goodsName},goodsPrice = #{goodsPrice},disPrice = #{disPrice},intotal = #{intotal}, categoryId = #{categoryId},imgurl = #{imgurl} where goodsId = #{goodsId}
mapper.select: select goodsId,goodsName,goodsPrice,disPrice, intotal, categoryId, imgurl from goods order by goodsId
select goodsId,goodsName,goodsPrice,disPrice, intotal, categoryId, imgurl from goods where goodsId = #{goodsId}
select CategoryId,Category from goodstype order by CategoryId
select goodsId,goodsName,goodsPrice,disPrice, intotal, categoryId, imgurl from goods where categoryId = #{categoryId}
